Package edu.packt.neuralnet.math

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IActivationFunction
    This interface represents the activation function applicable to the neural network.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayOperations
    This class has static functions that are used to make array operations, i.e., get max and min value of an array, calculate average and std dev of an array, etc
    HyperTan
    This class represents the Hyperbolic Tangent Activation Function implementing the interface IActivationFunction
    IdentityMatrix
    This class generates an identity matrix
    Linear
    This class represents the pure linear activation function, implementing the interface IActivationFunction
    Matrix
    This class has several methods to manipulate matrixes mathematically It is used by ELM and Levenberg-Marquardt learning algorithms
    RandomNumberGenerator
    This class generates double precision random numbers according to a seed.
    Sigmoid
    This class represents the sigmoid activation function, implementing the interface IActivationFunction
    Step
    This class implements the interface IActivationFunction to represent the Hardlimiting Threshold or Step function
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IActivationFunction.ActivationFunctionENUM
    This enumeration lists some of the common used activation functions.
